answers.answer: This has nothing to do with an eating disorder. I would see your primary doctor and if necessary he will refer you to a gastroenterologist. I don't know where you live, but if you don't need a referral I would suggest just going to the gastroenterologist.

Good, I'm glad to hear it, Rakesh. I'm also a diabetic, and diabetes can affect so many things, so be sure and keep your blood sugar in target as much as possible (under 100 fasting and under 140 2 hours after meals). I hope the medication helps.Zoe
